name: Operation: Find Bebo
description:
You play as a young kid, your goal is to find Bebo, your beloved teddy bear, to be able to sleep.

However, your trusted companion is elsewhere, the lights are off and you're on a mission to conquer your fear of the dark to rescue your friend.

Your mind will summon monsters, but you'll also conjure weapons to fight them. Luckily it's all a product of your imagination...

...Although damage to the house is very real, so be careful. Or wreck everything on purpose!
